forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Scattered showers and thunderstorms. Partly sunny, with a high near 91. Southwest wind around 10 mph. Chance of precipitation is 50%. New rainfall amounts between a tenth and quarter of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.shortForecast: Scattered Showers And Thunderstorms then Showers And Thunderstorms Likely
forecast.detailedForecast: Scattered showers and thunderstorms before 8pm, then showers and thunderstorms likely. Mostly cloudy. Low around 70, with temperatures rising to around 72 overnight. West southwest wind 3 to 9 mph. Chance of precipitation is 60%. New rainfall amounts between a quarter and half of an inch possible.

forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of rain showers before 8pm. Mostly clear, with a low around 62. North northeast wind 2 to 6 mph.

nubsNob.comments: Thank you for making 2024-25 another great season! Stay tuned for updates, we look forward to having you back next year.
